entry.title: $2500 // Large 1 bedroom + alcove apartment
entry.content:
We are looking for someone for our rental apartment for 4-6 months. The apartment is a light filled 1 Bedroom + alcove, 1 bathroom apartment in Prospect Heights. Close the 2/3, B/Q and C stations. 15 mins to Manhattan.

It's a great place for small families, since we have used the alcove as a kid room. Incredible location in a very lively neighborhood. Wonderful restaurants, shops, cafes and bars right up at the corner. 4 blocks to Prospect Park.

More about the apartment:

- 1 bedroom with built in closets, windows that easily fit a king size bed and an additional dresser or chair for a reading nook

- 1 alcove with a window that can fit a full bed with space for a night table or a crib and dresser.

- Open Kitchen looks into the living/dining area.





Price: $2300 a month

Size: around 800sq ft

Location: Corner of Bergen St and Vanderbilt Ave in Prospect Heights.

entry.title: $2699 // Huge Stunning 1 Bed 1 Bath Garden Level Backyard Crown Heights
entry.content:
Reside in gorgeous 1 bedroom garden apartment with huge yard. Spend your summer chillin with friends BBQing. Large kitchen with diswasher and tons of cabinets for storage Hardwood floors,plenty natural sunlight.
To live in Crown Heights is to live in convenience and a diverse community. Enjoy the luxury of having access to most train lines like the 2,3,4,5 and C, or switch to any letter train at Atlantic terminal.
Enjoy a short walk to Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, and Botanic Garden. Crown Heights offers a number of local restaurants and bars like Chavela's, Dutch Boy, Cent'Anni, Drink Lounge, 99 Rogers, Mayfield, Cafe Rue Dix, Glady's and more! Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods.
No brokers fee! H+HW included and cooking gas.
